name: OpenStack Client (from pipx)
description: Install an up-to-date version of OpenStack client with pipx.

version.description: Select or enter an OpenStack client version.

aodh.description: Select or enter an OpenStack Alarming as a Service client version. To avoid installation use "none".

barbican.description: Select or enter an OpenStack Barbican Key Management API client version. To avoid installation use "none".

blazar.description: Select or enter an OpenStack Blazar Reservation Service client version. To avoid installation use "none".

ceilometer.description: Select or enter an OpenStack Ceilometer API client version. To avoid installation use "none".

cinder.description: Select or enter an OpenStack Cinder Volume API client version. To avoid installation use "none".

cloudkitty.description: Select or enter an OpenStack Cloudkitty Rating as a Service API client version. To avoid installation use "none".

congress.description: Select or enter an OpenStack Congress (open policy framework for the cloud) client version. To avoid installation use "none".

cyborg.description: Select or enter an OpenStack Cyborg API client version. To avoid installation use "none".

designate.description: Select or enter an OpenStack Designate API client version. To avoid installation use "none".

freezer.description: Select or enter an OpenStack Freezer (backup restore and disaster recovery service) client version. To avoid installation use "none".

fuel.description: Select or enter an OpenStack Fuel client version. To avoid installation use "none".

glance.description: Select or enter an OpenStack Glance client version. To avoid installation use "none".

glare.description: Select or enter an OpenStack GLare Artifact REpository API client version. To avoid installation use "none".

heat.description: Select or enter an OpenStack Heat client version. To avoid installation use "none".

hplefthand.description: Select or enter an OpenStack HP LeftHand/StoreVirtual HTTP REST client version. To avoid installation use "none".

ironic-inspector-.description: Select or enter an OpenStack Ironic Inspector client version. To avoid installation use "none".

ironic.description: Select or enter an OpenStack Ironic (bare metal Service) client version. To avoid installation use "none".

karbor.description: Select or enter an OpenStack Karbor API client version. To avoid installation use "none".

keystone.description: Select or enter an OpenStack Keystone API client version. To avoid installation use "none".

magnum.description: Select or enter an OpenStack Magnum API client version. To avoid installation use "none".

manila.description: Select or enter an OpenStack Manila (shared file system as a service) client version. To avoid installation use "none".

mistral.description: Select or enter an OpenStack Mistral (Workflow as a Service) client version. To avoid installation use "none".

monasca.description: Select or enter an OpenStack Monasca API client version. To avoid installation use "none".

murano.description: Select or enter an OpenStack Murano API client version. To avoid installation use "none".

neutron.description: Select or enter an OpenStack Neutron API client version. To avoid installation use "none".

nova.description: Select or enter an OpenStack Nova API client version. To avoid installation use "none".

panko.description: Select or enter an OpenStack Panko version. To avoid installation use "none".

qinling.description: Select or enter an OpenStack Qinling (Function as a Service) version. To avoid installation use "none".

sahara.description: Select or enter an OpenStack Sahara client version. To avoid installation use "none".

searchlight.description: Select or enter an OpenStack Searchlight (Indexing and Search API) client version. To avoid installation use "none".

senlin.description: Select or enter an OpenStack Senlin Clustering API client version. To avoid installation use "none".

swift.description: Select or enter an OpenStack Swift client version. To avoid installation use "none".

tacker.description: Select or enter an OpenStack Tacker client version. To avoid installation use "none".

trove.description: Select or enter an OpenStack Trove client version. To avoid installation use "none".
